It is my pleasure to recommend Kevin Maya. Kevin was a student in my University of Central Arkansas (UCA) Marketing course.  He was part of a class challenged with coordinating the marketing strategy of a new start-up business. I’ve witnessed Kevin's efficiency and work ethic. These qualities along with his leadership skills, participation in school organizations, mentoring role and strong efforts in his UCA studies have convinced me of Kevin's value as a team member. Kevin continues to stay in touch now offering ideas and support toward my own business effort, and compare notes around our mutual appreciation for national politics.I wholeheartedly recommend Kevin without hesitation.  Feel free to contact me should you require additional information. Best Regards, Bill Doshier,  Executive in Residence / InstructorMarketing & Management Department University of Central Arkansas, College of Business

summary: NEW .BUZZ TOP LEVEL DOMAIN OPERATOR, ENTREPRENEUR, SALES STRATEGIST & TROUT MASTEROperator of the new .BUZZ Top Level Domain registry and Create.Buzz LLC,  launched January 15, 2014.   They say:  Innovative technology leader with excellent relationship skills.  Team player bringing creativity and entrepreneurial spirit to all business endeavors. I say:  Proven sales strategist and startup entrepreneur with 20+ years experience emphasizing branding and marketing.
